CMT_V.phrase: tell Tell me all the books published in year 1993.
give Give me all the books published in year 1993.
return Return all the books published in year 1993.
list List all the books published in year 1993.
find Find all the books published in year 1993.
show Show all the books published in year 1993.
retrieve Retrieve all the books published in year 1993.
display Display all the books published in year 1993.
search Search all the books published in year 1993.
select Select all the books published in year 1993.
produce Produce all the books published in year 1993.

OBT.phrase: sort by Find all the books published by Ayn Rand, sorted by title.
order by Find all the books published by Ayn Rand, ordered by title.

FT.phrase: minimum min Find the books with the minimum price.
earliest min What is the book published by Ayn Rand with the earliest year?
smallest min What is the book with the smallest number of authors?
lowest min What is the book with the lowest price?
maximum max What is the book with the maximum price?
latest max What is the book published by Ayn Rand with the latest year?
largest max What is the book with the largest number of authors?
highest max What is the book with the highest price?
average avg What is the average price of all the books published in 1995?
total sum Find the books with a total of 5 authors.
number of count Find the books, where the number of authors of each book is 5.

OT.phrase: earlier < Find all the books of Ayn Rand, where the year of each book is earlier than the year of "Fountain Head".
later > Find all the books of Ayn Rand, where the year of each book is later than the year of "Fountain Head".
greater > Find all the books with greater than 2 editors.
more > Find all the books with more than 2 editors.
less < Find all the books with less than 5 authors.
larger > Find all the books, where the number of authors of each book is larger than 5.
smaller < Find all the books, where the number of authors of each book is smaller than 5.
higher > Find all the books, where the price of each book is higher than 100.
below < Find all the books, where the price of each book is lower than 5.
lower < Find all the books, where the price of each book is lower than 5.
before < Find all the books by Ayn Rand published before 1949.
after > Find all the books published after 2004.
equal = Find all the books of Ayn Rand, where the year of each book is equal to the year of "Fountain Head".
same = Return the articles where the author is the same as the author of "Java and XML"

QT.phrase: every all Return all the books, where the name of every author of each book ends with "Green".
some any Return all the books, where the name of some authors of each book ends with "Green".
